itemLabel: Cledwyn Hughes, Baron Cledwyn of Penrhos

wikipedia_page.main: Cledwyn Hughes, Baron Cledwyn of Penrhos,  (14 September 1916 – 22 February 2001) was a Welsh Labour politician, usually associated with the moderate wing of the party. He was also regarded, particularly in later years, as a non-political figure of stature in Wales having held posts of importance in bodies such as the University of Wales.
